osyfe.graphic

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.graphic.Rendable<Model>
      • osyfe.graphic.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deletable

    public class Model
extends Rendable<Model>
    Represents a related set of meshes. Animation information will be going here in the future.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Model.Animation
      Represents an animation applicable for this model.
      static class  Model.Bone
      Represents a bone of the defined skeleton.
      static class  Model.ModelData
      Stores data of a loaded model.

      • numBones

        public int numBones()
        Gives the number of bones of the skeleton. A value of -1 means that there is no skeleton in this model.
